title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version, I am unable to access the popup menu in the Java editor ruler.
OB: When I open a Java editor and right-click on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu appears. The expected menu should allow me to add breakpoints, marks, or perform other related actions.
EB: The expected behavior is that when I right-click on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, a popup menu should appear. This menu should provide options to add breakpoints, marks, or perform other relevant actions.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.

The expected result is that a popup menu should appear with options to add breakpoints, marks, or perform other related actions, but this does not occur.
